Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Hun-Grr/Wheeljack/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather/Vulois:::

::Hun-Grr jumps away from the flying arm::
Hun-Grr: BLOT!  STAY WHERE YOU ARE!
~~~~~
::Wheeljack runs to Composer::
Wheeljack: Your going to be alright, just DONT MOVE.
::He took out his anti-energon device and fired it at the net.  The net 
should deteriorate::
~~~~~
::Jetstorm and Godfather follow Shockaract and the Mob, but Sharpedge stays 
back::
Sharpedge:  I must find Deemos...
::He begins his search for Deemos::
~~~~~
::Vulois reaches the Maximal base and sees the big battle thats going on.  He 
turns to Thundercracker::
Vulois: We'll have to come back when the battle ends.
::He starts walking away::

--part1_e8.12c734d3.27fb11a0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
